summary: The diff implements a light-only theme with white background and warm beige/brown accent tokens by updating global CSS variables and enforcing light mode at runtime (ThemeProvider forced to light, removal of `.dark` class, and HTML-level light enforcement). No edits are shown under `frontend/src/components/ui`.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/work-tracking updates unrelated to theming requirements (new_feature_requests entries and status fields).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on restoring the light beige/brown palette and neutralizing dark mode; it does not request changes to `project_state.json` tracking content.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to `frontend-file-summaries.txt` describing many behavioral/features changes across pages/components (authentication flow hardening, error handling changes, workout edit workflow, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly exclude adding new product features unrelated to theming; the summary file claims additional functionality changes beyond theming (even if the actual code diffs are not shown here).
